import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Rotation matrix in 2D. -/
def R (Œ∏ : ‚Ñù) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù :=
  fun i j =>
    if i = 0 ‚àß j = 0 then Real.cos Œ∏
    else if i = 0 ‚àß j = 1 then -Real.sin Œ∏
    else if i = 1 ‚àß j = 0 then Real.sin Œ∏
    else Real.cos Œ∏

/-- The special orthogonal group SO(2) equals the set of 2√ó2 rotation matrices. -/
theorem SO2_eq_rotations :
  {A : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù | A.transpose * A = 1 ‚àß Matrix.det A = 1}
  = {A : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù | ‚àÉ Œ∏ : ‚Ñù, A = R Œ∏} := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- Rotation matrix in 2D. -/
noncomputable def R (Œ∏ : ‚Ñù) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù :=
  fun i j =>
    if i = 0 ‚àß j = 0 then Real.cos Œ∏
    else if i = 0 ‚àß j = 1 then -Real.sin Œ∏
    else if i = 1 ‚àß j = 0 then Real.sin Œ∏
    else Real.cos Œ∏

/-- The special orthogonal group SO(2) equals the set of 2√ó2 rotation matrices. -/
theorem SO2_eq_rotations :
  {A : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù | A.transpose * A = 1 ‚àß Matrix.det A = 1}
  = {A : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ‚Ñù | ‚àÉ Œ∏ : ‚Ñù, A = R Œ∏} := by sorry
